Title: Requires health insurance coverage for lymphedema
Summary: Requires health insurance policies and contracts shall provide coverage for the diagnosis and treatment of lymphedema, both primary and secondary lymphedema; requires such coverage shall include benefits for equipment, supplies, devices, complex decongestive therapy and out-patient self-management training and education for the treatment of lymphedema, both primary and secondary lymphedema.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring certain health insurance coverage for lymphedema
